title: Lys-Haut-Layon
text: Lys-Haut-Layon () is a <a href="Communes%20of%20France">commune</a> in the <a href="Maine-et-Loire">Maine-et-Loire</a> <a href="Departments%20of%20France">department</a> of western <a href="France">France</a>. The municipality was established on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of <a href="Vihiers">Vihiers</a> (including Saint-Hilaire-du-Bois and Le Voide), <a href="Les%20Cerqueux-sous-Passavant">Les Cerqueux-sous-Passavant</a>, <a href="La%20Fosse-de-Tign%C3%A9">La Fosse-de-Tigné</a>, <a href="Nueil-sur-Layon">Nueil-sur-Layon</a>, <a href="Tancoign%C3%A9">Tancoigné</a>, <a href="Tign%C3%A9">Tigné</a> and <a href="Tr%C3%A9mont%2C%20Maine-et-Loire">Trémont</a>.
